xwikidoc.name: XCSTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: XCSTranslations
xwikidoc.content:
xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepWelcome.title=Knowledge Base Flavor xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepWelcome.content1=This Flavors allows you to share knowledge across your team members by providing means for information to be collected, organized, searched and distributed.
xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepNavigation.title=Navigation xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepNavigation.content1=The Navigation Tree displays the wiki's hierarchy, containing pages and their children.
xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepTagCloud.title=Tag Cloud xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepTagCloud.content1=The Tag Cloud provides easy access to related pages, previously tagged.
xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepDashboard.title=Dashboard xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepDashboard.content1=The Dashboard is collecting recent applications and page events from the wiki. xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepDashboard.content2=As Administrator, you can customize it and select what to display.
xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepJoinWiki.title=Join Wiki xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepJoinWiki.content1=In order to have rights to create new pages and applications entries on this wiki, you need to be a member.
xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepBreadcrumb.title=Breadcrumb xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepBreadcrumb.content1=The breadcrumb allows you to identify where you are and navigate the hierarchy. xcs.knowledgeBase.tour.main.stepBreadcrumb.content2=The Home icon will take you to the main Home, where you can access all your wikis.
